Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near State/60th
ShortDescription: 29 State buses rerouted NB via Sate, Marquette, Wentworth, 59th & State; SB via Sate, 59th, Yale, Marquette & State due to police activity near State/60th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/60th due to police activity. 

  • Northbound buses will operate via Sate, Marquette, Wentworth, 59th, then resume their normal route on State
  • Southbound buses will operate via Sate, 59th, Yale, Marquette, then resume their normal route on State.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #59 59th/61stTemporary Reroute near State/60th
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses rrtd EB via 59th, Michigan, 61st  & over normal route; WB via 61st, Indiana, 59th & over normal route due to police activity near State/60th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/60th due to police activity. 

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 59th, Michigan, 61st, then resume their normal route.
  • Westbound buses will operate via 61st, Indiana, 59th, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line subway trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Cermak and Fullerton due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line subway trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Cermak and Fullerton due to track conditions.

Train service to Howard

After stopping at Cermak-Chinatown, Howard-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Armitage (accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Fullerton and make all normal stops to Howard.

Connections can be made between 95th/Dan Ryan-bound subway service and Howard-bound rerouted service via elevated lines at State/Lake (transfer to nearby elevated station, board on Brown Line side) and at Roosevelt (accessible).

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

95th/Dan Ryan-bound service is not affected.
